name: Creating Event CheckLists
description: Organize your event planning by generating a customized checklist with essential tasks and deadlines.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Write a checklist of 10 things to consider when planning an event {{name}} like [event type] {{type}}and estimated number of attendees {{attendance}} .

type.title: Event Type
type.description: Select the event type (e.g., conference, workshop, webinar) to tailor the checklist to common tasks for that format.

attendance.title: Estimated Attendance:
attendance.description: Provide an estimated number of attendees, which can influence some checklist items (e.g., venue size, catering needs).
